sentence: Down the ballot FIRST IN SCORE: THE CASH DASH — Pennsylvania state Attorney General Josh Shapiro, who is effectively running unopposed in the Democratic primary for governor, tells us he raised $6.3 million in the final quarter of 2021, POLITICO’s Holly Otterbein writes in to Score.
title: GOP Senate spending tops $15M in PA
